title: The Forgotten ADC: Kalista
body:
Let's talk about Kalista. Currently, shes the least played, "worst" ADC compared to all the others. Why don't we get Riot to show her some love with a small buff? (or a large one). I have started getting into playing her and I think her late game damage could use a buff. She doesn't do as much damage late game compared to her other fellow ADCs, but her early game seems to be okay. I think Riot should do something to bring her back into the meta.

 Another topic: Poor Kalista only has THREE skins, (Championship Kalista, has a golden chroma too but looks shitty. Blood moon Kalista. SKT T1 Kalista.) So the thing about this is,  she has 3 skins, pretty standard for an unpopular champion, but only ONE skin is available for purchase. (Blood moon Kalista) THE OTHER TWO ARE LEGACY. So if you want a skin for Kalista, too bad, you've only got one choice. I think Riot should make a new skin for Kalista this year, maybe a Dark star Kalista skin would be interesting. Anyways, I just wanted to post this to shed some love on Kalista.

honestly, kalista is in an okay spot if you're good with her. The biggest problem she has other than her high skill floor is that she needs a competent support. You could be the best kalista player in the world, and you'd still fall flat sometimes because you basically don't have an ult if your support is bad.
the problem with kalista is is shes good in soloque shes broken in pro play if shes balanced in pro shes unplayable in solo que.
Like several other champions, Kalista is intentionally trash for 99.9999% of the playerbase because if she wasn't she'd be 100% pick/ban in pro play and Riot doesn't want to interfere with that.
